entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
